structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 398, sec. 1, effective April 9, 1990. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 80, sec. 2, effective March 29, 1976. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 1. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 1. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 1.
